channel.title: Client will not start?!
channel.description:
Basically I was running my client and my laptop crashed so I then got a "A Java Exception has occured", so I uninstalled and installed java again. However now everytime I run my Run.bat for my client it doesn't open it?
I don't get an error message because my cmd closes instantly
Thank you,

item.title: Client will not start?!
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

What are the contents of your run.bat?

Read full topic

item.title: Client will not start?!
item.dc:creator: @m4x_pwng3 m4x pwng3
item.description:
@m4x_pwng3 wrote:

have you tried restarting your computer? It might not recognize that java has been re-installed.

Read full topic
